RemediationStrings.Title: A restart is required
RemediationStrings.Description: Your device reports a pending reboot for more than 7 days. Restart your  Windows machine to complete updates, then open Company Portal > settings > run Sync.

RemediationStrings.Title: Insufficient disk space on the System Drive.
RemediationStrings.Description: Ensure at least 5 GB of free space is available on C: drive.

RemediationStrings.Title: 'Device Management Wireless Application Protocol (WAP) Push message Routing Service' service is unhealthy
RemediationStrings.Description: Ensure 'Device Management WAP Push message Routing Service' is not disabled and running, then open Company Portal > settings > run Sync.

RemediationStrings.Title: Intune Management Extension is not running
RemediationStrings.Description: Start 'Microsoft Intune Management Extension' and set Startup type to Automatic (or restart the device), then open Company Portal > settings > run Sync.

RemediationStrings.Title: Windows Update service not healthy
RemediationStrings.Description: Set 'Windows Update' (wuauserv) Startup type to Manual/Automatic, restart the device, then open Company Portal > settings > run Sync.

RemediationStrings.Title: Microsoft Account Sign-in Assistant not healthy
RemediationStrings.Description: Set 'Microsoft Account Sign-in Assistant' (wlidsvc) to Manual/Automatic, restart the device, then open Company Portal > settings > run Sync.

RemediationStrings.Title: Quality Updates deferral must be less than 7
RemediationStrings.Description: To Set DeferQualityUpdatesPeriodInDays to a value less than 7 Or kindly contact support team.

RemediationStrings.Title: Quality updates are paused
RemediationStrings.Description: On the search menu look for 'Check for Updates' > click Check for Updates'.
